metadata.dc:description: This is the case of a young woman, 16-year-old, calling to our Department because of the appearance, in the floor of the mouth, of a mass progressively growing until about 5 cm diameter. Through fine needle biopsy was diagnosed of epidermoid cyst. Despite its size and infrahyoid site was removed successfully. Perusal review of last years bibliography and its variants.
metadata.dc:title: Quiste dermoide de suelo de boca. Revisión a propósito de un caso.
[Dermoid cyst of the floor of the mouth. A case report].
